lines.text: We'll do fine. There'll be a whole damn army here in a minute.
It's a 400; it's programmed not to stop us.
Oh, I thought you'd never ask!
But ya like a little bit don't cha? Anyway we're going to be alone together for a week, so what the hell.
I don't like being called socks.
I can't help that. The first time we... well, the first time we were together you had those outrageous red socks on. It took me a week to get over that.

While you are a glamorous, and highly paid television personality, you are still an employee. In fact, you're my employee. So, unless you'd like to spend the next 3 years doing weather and fashion in Sioux Falls, South Dakota, you will now shut up and do as you're told.
Oh, yes? Yes, Arthur? we'll see about that!
